name: Iwanthotdrink
0:
”Alexa I want hot drink”
”Alexa open I want hot drink”
”Alexa launch I want hot drink”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: i want hot drink
des:
I want hot drink provides fun the whole family and friends can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smile. The skill will ask you the kind of hot drink you want and present you various options to choose the right kind of drink.

To start, just say "Alexa, I want hot drink" or "Alexa, open I want hot drink" or "Alexa, launch I want hot drink", to get started.

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
